description:
ATTENTION!!!
This Script is OUTDATED and discontinued!!!
==================================================

A complete remake of my old style, now works with and without "Pictures in chat" (by Dave C) Gmail LAB!

--- Screens taken with (v1.000) ---
The screens have no paint tricks at all, they are simple and plain direct screens, i only mount 4-in-1 for simplify the comparison.
additional_info:
########## (v1.010) ##########
- Starting change the call part, only one small detail yet.
- Style renamed.
- Very very small tweaks and optimizations.

########## (v1.000) ##########
- Complete remake from scratch.
- Complete smooth integration.
- Compatible with "Pictures in chat" (by Dave C) Gmail LAB.

########## (v0.460) ##########
- 1st public release.

--------------------------------------------------
Some features...
- Minor tweaks in window chat title and chat top buttons.
- New font "Trebuchet MS" in the chat messages and in the input text box.
- New colors for user chat names, system messages, alert messages and error messages.
- New color for alert zone texts.
- Vertical space pixel's gain.
- Black background messages and white text on it, because i like it better that way.
--------------------------------------------------
